title: News24.com | Ramaphosa to make ‘serious decisions’ about lockdown based on science, possible economic repercussions
description: President Cyril Ramaphosa has not yet taken a decision on whether the current lockdown will be extended, or whether a second lockdown is being considered.
content:
President Cyril Ramaphosa will make "serious decisions" about the lockdown after considering all options based on scientific modelling and advice as well as the possible economic repercussions of the nationwide shutdown.
Jackson Mthembu, the minister in the … [+5078 chars]
